name: Urbex Night Security
description:
In 1996, a student begins working as a night guard at an abandoned factory which was built before the Second World War on the outskirts of Berlin.
Spending the night shifts alone, the player begins to uncover the dark history of the factory and the local legends that surround it.
Will be able to survive the confrontation with the darkness lurking within the walls of the old factory?

- atmosphere of urban exploring
- movie storytelling
- find out dark secrets of the old factory
- explore the realistic environment
- VHS style
- two endings
- unique and horryfying enemy representation
- atmosphere of the 80s/90s

GAMEPLAY


Lenght:
1,5 - 2,5 hours
The game is geared towards unique experience rather than length.

Saves:
The game does not have a save system.
Instead, it is divided into checkpoints / small chapters, allowing the player to replay interesting parts of the game after completing the story.
